website_summaries.verdict: This farmhouse style cabinet features handy adjustable shelving. Offers amazing value for money.
pros: We love the stylish design, which is constructed from engineered wood with an oak laminate finish
Strong, sturdy, and easy to clean
Features three adjustable shelves hidden behind a decorative beaded panel door
cons: Some users report receiving damaged parts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow instructions. This is a heavy, well-made pantry. It took me about two hours to assemble it myself. As a woman, the hardest part was moving the box inside (HEAVY). For single gals like me, I'd suggest cutting the box and bringing it inside piece by piece. It's sturdy and looks great in my kitchen. I love the extra storage space! HINT: If, at first, the door doesn't close correctly, loosen the screws on the door, readjust it, and tighten when adjusted correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great pantry!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 60 year old female and assembled it by myself. It is quite heavy and would be much easier if you have two people for assembly. I advise everyone to familiarize yourself with all the parts and then follow the step by step instructions in the booklet. That's what I did and didn't have any problems. Sauder products are much better quality than some of the others out there. This pantry looks great. I assembled it on my living room floor, but I plan to move it to my travel trailer for extra storage of food and kitchen items.
customer_reviews.author: The Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Way nicer than I even thought!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was skeptical reading the reviews and My husband didn't want me to buy a cheap put together piece of furniture. This piece is beautiful. So glad I took the risk. It was easy to put together. And doesn't look cheap at all. It help uncluttered my kitchen and looks great with my oak cabinets. It did come with a small piece of damage in one of the boards but you can hardly notice it. Even my husband was quite impressed by it. Might buy another for my livingroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Jesson

customer_reviews.title: Easy Build for One
customer_reviews.text: I was cautious after reading some other reviews, but we are very happy with our purchase. After committing about 2 hours to building, I was successfully able to build it by myself without issue. One tip: double and triple check the way pieces are supposed to be placed - after putting on the bottom piece, I realized it was backwards and the holes were not where I needed them. The images in the instructions are not the best quality but after comparing the picture on the box, it is easy to tell where everything goes. Be organized and methodical when building, and it will all be worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy materials, looks nice if you don't look TOO closely.
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet went together fairly easily. I assembled it largely by myself and it took about an hour. The pre-assembled door panel and hinges did not line up properly. It was the perfect size for the small space I had available and holds towels and bathroom supplies very well. However, the door panels separated and fell off within the first day! We've removed it and wood glued it back together. I'll update regarding durability.
customer_reviews.author: WritetheWrongs

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort!!! :-)
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple hours to put together, but soooo worth the effort!!! Looks great & fits the purpose fantastically!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn from Santa Cruz, California

customer_reviews.title: I'M GIVING MINE AWAY.
customer_reviews.text: No better than okay. It doesn't look at all like real wood and the assembly instructions are less then complete. there are 6-8 instances when you are instructed to screw into pressed board without pre-drilled holes--often in tight spaces. Time-consuming and frustrating. It's also larger than I thought it would be. Were it a good-looking piece of furniture it wouldn't bother me but that's not the case here. After having bought it, assembled it and standing back and taking a good look at it, I've decided to donate it to Salvation Army.
customer_reviews.author: Quality/Value Consumer

customer_reviews.title: I want more!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Sauder pantry my husband and I put together. After the first one, I could see where I could really use another. We now have one in the kitchen, and one in my office. I would highly recommend Sauder furniture to anyone. The prices are very reasonable, and the pieces look nice in your home. Just don't think you can skip around in the instructions. Be sure to do it as written . . . 1, 2, 3. . . etc. Otherwise, you're going to get in trouble. Right now, I'm looking for another style of Sauder furniture I have in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Shanta

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about shipping damage, after reading other reviews, but this unit came well packaged and undamaged. It is heavy, so I unpacked it outside and brought it inside piece by piece. It is not real wood, and its not going to fool anybody, but it looks pretty good. The directions are clear, the holes are drilled correctly, so it goes together easy. Its not fine furniture, but it doesn't feel cheap either, sturdy enough. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom G Evans

customer_reviews.title: Cute but detective
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed these cabinets , I ordered two both were damaged. One had a big chunk out of one of the side panels and the second one, the door appears to be cut wrong it closes but the magnet latch doesn't line up so the door won't stay closed. There is a huge gap at the top where the door should line up with the cabinet. They are cute and was as described but I seemed to receive 2 defective cabinets .
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for our purpose
customer_reviews.text: Two purchased for our breezeway/mudroom. Minimally packaged - some minor shipping damage. Took several hours to assemble each. Read everything on each page of the manual, some assembly sequences are not intuitive. Doors are not reversible, so if purchasing two as we did, be sure to get a left and right hand door if they will be either side of a bench, for example. Need strong hand strength in order to tighten cam locks to correct rotation. Units are not bug proof due to clearances around recessed doors.
customer_reviews.author: roybil

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was BETTER than expected. It took about 2.5 hours to assemble, but worth the effort. Instructions were clear and all the parts were included and in good condition. I have ordered many pieces of furniture to assemble and this was one of the best. Looks great, sturdy, and has plenty of room for storage. Allow yourself enough time to do a good job on the assembly and you should have a real nice cabinet to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Guy in a Little Coat

customer_reviews.title: Get extra screws
customer_reviews.text: This is not as well-designed as other Sauder products I have purchased in the past, but it does the job. Some screws missing in the installation - be careful, if you use the wrong length it'll pop through the finish, and its not really fixable. I took a few wood screws and added them in a few key places to make it a bit more sturdy. Its designed to be screwed to a wall, or lean against one. The back is not very nice looking, but the rest of it works.
customer_reviews.author: K. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Has it's uses but over priced.
customer_reviews.text: It holds quite a bit but assembling it was a pain. I'm not sure what the proper name is for the screws that lock but the locking mechanism did not want to lock and would come unlocked. One of the bottom screws on the cabinet came undone. After it was completely built. In order to access you have to unscrew the entire bottom half of the cabinet. Quite frankly not worth it. I feel like it might hold up 6 months. We will see as a temporary solution it works but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my 1920 craftsman
customer_reviews.text: We live in the typical 100 year old house with little storage, and needed a place to store towels and linens. We have a little nook of dead space in the hallway that this fit perfectly into. The color of it is great and it matches the style of the home. I’m happy to have found something that doesn’t look incredibly cheap or out of place for such a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Arrived heavily damaged, but ordering replacement parts was a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: My cabinet arrived with 6/16 main components completely broken and I was extremely disheartened at the thought of having to return such a heavy and large package. I checked on the Sauder website and was pleased to see that it was easy to order replacement parts online. They shipped out my replacements on the next business day and they arrived in perfect condition. We were able to assemble the cabinet easily and are now very happy with this purchase. If you need to order any replacement parts, simply click on the Customer Service icon on the Sauder website and there is a prompt to order whatever you need, which is easily and quick if you have the manual to reference.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Challenging assembly
customer_reviews.text: More pieces than expected. You need some hand strength to tighten fasteners. Looks ok when finished but the door is thin and light weight and feels flimsy when you open it. Sitting in place it gives the appearance of being fairly sturdy, but when you move it, it feels and sounds like it could come apart pretty easily. Might hold up with gentle use. If you want something solid, keep looking. You will not want to take it apart to return it.
customer_reviews.author: ctohio

customer_reviews.title: Not too large but plenty of storage space
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these a few years ago for myself. I got this as a Christmas gift for my mom. She loves it. She likes that she can see exactly what she has in the pantry. It's not too large and has plenty of storage space. The adjustable shelves make it easy to store taller items .
customer_reviews.author: savy shopper

customer_reviews.title: This is a lovely sturdy piece.
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment with a small kitchen and this fit perfectly next to the refrigerator and the wall. It is really nice looking and sturdy. My floor tends to slope forward so I placed furniture protectors under the front feet and it is perfect. My son put it together and all the holes lined up without a problem. It took a couple of hours but it was not frustrating for him. It is a well made piece and I am storing groceries with a lot of canned goods. I put cloth placemats on the shelves to protect the finish and they were a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put Together
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pantry I bought one a month ago and I am using it in the bathroom I am getting another for the bedroom I live in Tiny house style and it is a great piece I also bought a kitchen set from same company and love it the chairs fit under table It’s a great piece for large or very small living spaces Also every thing fit beautifully from the bathroom Very easy to put together everything is marked Also anyone who has seen it wants one. Enjoy 😊.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the worst item I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the worst item I've ever purchased. I put it together hoping it would be ok once it was assembled, but I was wrong and now it's impossible to send it back. I've purchased particle board furniture in the past and this is by far the cheapest, unsteady, flimsy one I've ever seen. I guess you get what you pay for, but I want my $100 back.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee L. Messier

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Lots of room, sturdy and classy-looking!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rave enough about this pantry. We owned one in our old house but had to sell it when we moved. Now we have a new house and so I bought another one. It is as good as I remember! Very sturdy with TONS of storage for all our extra kitchen "junk". I painted it white. Word of caution: if you want to paint it, use light sandpaper on it first and a good primer. I like Zinser.
customer_reviews.author: Writergirl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of the cabinet. Fits well alongside our kitchen cabinets and holds a lot of supplies. My only complaint is that it was missing a couple screws and some of the screws were not the size called for in the instructions. But I was able to improvise from hardware I had. Would definitely recommend. It is heavy enough that 2 people will make some of the assembly and positioning easier.
customer_reviews.author: peacepastor

customer_reviews.title: Great, Heavy, Looks Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Stupid good for the cost. Shows up in a heavy box, very straight forward construction, took me hardly any time at all, looks great, sturdy, and magnetic plate keeps door shut. Does absolutely everything I want, and not bad for the price. Only con? The door has nothing to stop it from swinging all the way open, and banging. So, just dont yank the door too hard, and you'll be set.
customer_reviews.author: Whoistcmt

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased Sauder products in the past and have been satisfied. I received this cabinet on a Friday afternoon, and started to assemble it. I got about half way through and discovered that one of the pieces didn't have the holes drilled in it. I figure I could drill the holes in it. Then I realized that the piece I needed to measure the drilling was missing. I tried to call Sauder and they had just closed for the weekend. They closed at 5:30 pm. Therefore, I have a half put together cabinet sitting on my living room floor for the entire weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Garden

customer_reviews.title: Please don’t buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A waste of money. This was insane to put together, it’s flimsy, and the side actually splintered at the top when we were putting it together. I really wish I hadn’t wasted my money because I don’t see it lasting long. EDIT: now that it’s put together I see what my husband meant by the fact that nothing lined up correctly. I literally am putting this directly in the trash because I can’t even use it. $120+ tossed away, an absolute buying regret.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pantry Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet arrived quickly and well-packaged. In addition to the Amazon email advising me of shipping, I received an email from the distributor asking me to contact them if I had any problems at all. Nice touch. The package came with all pieces and undamaged. The assembly instructions are very clear and if you are a little confused there is an online video you can watch. I did and it cleared up my source of confusion (I am not mechanical.). It took me about 2 hours to assemble the cabinet. It is important to pay attention to the very clear, step-by-step instructions. This is a good, sturdy cabinet. There is lots of room. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today- unfortunately a couple of pieces are dinged, I was hoping it was a back corner, but it’s right in front- My husband and I finally got it together, almost 2 hours to get it together- and we are both people that build things together- I can’t believe how heavy-duty itis- nice quality for the money!
customer_reviews.author: nemiller

customer_reviews.title: Buy at own risk
customer_reviews.text: The door is coming apart, I'm going to have to use wood glue. It really needs two magnetic closures, at the top n bottom. It's flimsy for the price I paid, I expected much better. Plus I had one piece I couldn't use bc of the holes not lined up. It was a piece for the bottom part. I kept it bc I already put it together n needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Looks good to me
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to assemble this very heavy piece. From the picture and description I believe it will fit well in the space I intended to place it. The shelves will hold many cans and boxes of foods. I see no reason why even a toaster or can opener could not be stored inside. Further, I think the top shelf might be good to use for spices or bags of flour or sugar. The top of the cabinet I intend to store my mixer for convenient access.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: So, I really do like this pantry. Not huge but just right. It took me about two hours to put together. I can appreciate how cute it is I did notice the material is a bit cheap as the edges were quick to become damaged and when I dropped a tool on it the wood indented immediately. Other than this I like and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect for two people
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I got this for our house to use as a pantry, and it is serving it's purpose very well! Although it's on the smaller side, it's perfect for two people. It's very sturdy, and I would recommend two people to put it together, although my husband did it himself. The reason why I took off one star is because the back isn't thick, it's just the thin sheet pf plywood that you nail into the back.
customer_reviews.author: JoLynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased Sauder products in the past and they are made well for being particle board products and for the price you pay. It matches well with my parents kitchen cabinets. It was however time consuming and a bit hard to put together. We are happy with the purchase though. It turned out very nice once put together.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pre-drilled Holes & Shelves Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Photo is what it looks like completely put together. The instructions took a few minutes on each step to read and understand what was going on. A couple of the shelves were damaged but they still work fine. The main complaint I have is that there were supposed to be 4 pre-drilled holes to attach the top part, and there were only 2. All around, it is a good cabinet. Has more storage space than I was expecting for the dimensions. One bonus feature that I didn't realize it had was a safety strap to attach to the wall so it doesn't fall over. Having a small child, I really liked this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Baine

customer_reviews.title: DOORS WON'T ALIGN PERFECTLY
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT 4 FOR EXTRA PANTRY SPACE. STURDY. HOLDS A LOT. NO WAY TO ALIGN DOORS AND HAD TO PURCHASE AND INSTALL ROLLER CATCH TO KEEP DOORS CLOSED. WHY NOT INCLUDED! STILL QUITE WELL MADE UNITS AND ONE PC ARRIVED CRACKED WHICH SAUDER REPLACED WITH NO HASSLE. GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE. SUGGESTION TO SAUDER; INCLUDE ROLLER CATCH, WILL ELIM. MANY CUSTOMER COMPLAINTS.
customer_reviews.author: GORDON PALM COAST

customer_reviews.title: Great product and awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some extra storage temporarily in my kitchen and thought this would look very nice. It can be moved to a different room later and look like it belongs. It's very versatile and I love the finished product! Also, I had an issue with some peeling going on in the door jamb. I called the company to see what glue they would recommend to hold it down but instead she immediately said she would send me a new door! I was extremely pleased and surprised, I haven't dealt with a company that has such awesome customer service in a very long time!! I will definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: This storage pantry is good for the price. My husband put this together in about 45 minutes. Looks very nice, the only flaw is the door doesn't come completely shut when closed, it sticks out about 1/4 inch or so, doesn't affect the use at all. I assume it's a magnet issue. Otherwise, very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality, beautiful features
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. It was perfect for my space and freed up my cabinets for small appliances and such. I have honey oak cabinets and while it’s not an exact match it still coordinates well with my kitchen. It’s sturdy and good quality. Only thing I’d change is add an extra magnet to the bottom of the door for a more secure close. Overall very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: HBMommy14

customer_reviews.title: Sauder 401867 Summer Home Pantry, L: 21.50" x W: 14.49" x H: 61.10", Carolina Oak finish
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have ordered many Sauder pieces over the years and this one did not disappoint. It's time consuming to put together (approx 4 hrs) Pay close attention to their illustrations and directions and most of all BE PATIENT when putting together. I am 48y/o Female and it was trying at times but well worth it! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Rozie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy pantry adds much needed storage space
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 4.5 stars if I could. Sturdy, matches our kitchen cabinets perfectly and was pretty easy to assemble. Only knock is the magnetic part of the door took a little adjusting so it would actually stay closed. Other than that, we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kris G

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelves and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like that this was skinny enough to fit between my fridge and wall. I use it to store dry goods and canned food. It was easy to put together and shelves can hold a dexent amount of weight.
customer_reviews.author: keira

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I have a hard time reaching the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it.I have a hard time reaching the high shelves in my kitchen cabinets.My legs would shake on my step stool,this is perfect and lots of room,also perfect for my small apt.The color is a bit darker than the picture here but it doesn't bother me.Only downside the instructions were a bit confusing and took awhile to put together.The package is very heavy so I would recommend having help getting inside.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice extra storage unit.
customer_reviews.text: It suits its purpose. Loaded it up with food staples like canned goods, flour, sugar and the like. Looks nice, not heirloom furniture but nice for the cost. It is VERY heavy. On arrival both large side pieces were broken. Called Sauder and they sent them out right away and I received them within 3 days. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Carolle

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This was the nicest piece flat pack furniture I've ever had. Overall really nice quality though the wall mount his aweful and the door feels a bit flimsy (although it looks really sturdy) Fairly clear instructions. Took me about two hours to put together by myself with an electric drill. Probably would have taken an extra hour to do manually.
customer_reviews.author: AM T

customer_reviews.title: nice extra storage
customer_reviews.text: this was not too hard to assemble. I did not receive all the hardware needed but I had the extra hardware in garage to finish the job.. It looks good and hold the kitchen aid mixer, air fryer and Insta pot clearing the clutter off the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sauder fan
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have put together many assemble yourself pieces of furniture, early on back in the 80's-90's Sauder was not one of my favorites manufactures, poor quality, holes that did not align etc., That is all changed now, this is the second Sauder kit I have put together recently and I am impressed as to how the quality has improved both in fit and finish. I was so impressed that I just ordered another Pantry.
customer_reviews.author: D. Raidt

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions in description misleading
customer_reviews.text: Good product but I only had 15 inches wide of space to work with and I bought thus based on the dimensions. I spent hours assembling it it’s now 2 am in the morning only to realize that it’s too wide. How can you promote incorrect dimensions? Now I’m stuck with a cabinet that is already assembled in a small apartment. I’m exhausted and mad. How do I return this?
customer_reviews.author: CampNYC

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet, sturdy once assembled. Good amount of storage, fit perfectly in the space I had.....
customer_reviews.text: Nice item, used some wood glue during assembly to help sturdy things up, but would be okay without the glue, just have to be sure every piece is attached before trying to move the cabinet. Good amount of storage. Assembled myself in about 1 1/2 hours. Left the bathroom door and the cabinet door open for about a week to get rid of the pressed board smell. Would recommend this cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: I. J. Gargano

customer_reviews.title: Highly Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: After buying and returning another pantry cabinet that had "no word" instructions, missing screws, wood pieces, etc., I purchased this one which is very nice. The wood is very heavy, instructions are easy and there is also a 1-800 number you can call and get a live person for help putting it together, if needed. They are very knowledgeable of their product, they are very patient and will tell you where each piece goes if you have a problem with assembly. I highly recommend this pantry cabinet and the inside shelves are very deep. Thanks Saunder Furniture!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Saturn08

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it, because during the assembly I placed a rod like to the part that is supposed to go into, only for it to go so deep that it went right thru, it is just pressed cardboard, & for the price I would not buy it. It is just a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Michaud

customer_reviews.title: Nice pantry for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and does the job. I would have given it 5 stars but gave it 4 since I think the shelves should came with brackets for more support. The shelves only support 25 lbs and that is a good amount, but when you are putting cans on a shelf the weight adds up fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S Berry

customer_reviews.title: Home pantry
customer_reviews.text: The bad news..took 5 hours for two of us to put together and my husband is pretty handy. It is not real wood, but for the cost of this item, it is to be expected. However, the back piece is cardboard and folded in half. You really have to struggle to get it flat and nailed on. Also, some holes were not pre drilled. Good news..once assembled, it is sturdy enough. It matches my kitchen cabinets perfectly. I like it and it holds quite a few items. All the hardware was included, nothing missing, which as you know, is a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: pfaulk

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Lovely pantry, exactly what I was looking for and well made. My only disappointment was assembly. I hired an experience handyman to assemble and it took him 3 hours. 32 nails and not sure how many other pieces of hardware. I'm sure you will be happy with the quality of this product but it's not an easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Withakay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hidden storage
customer_reviews.text: I needed a place to store things out of sight in my kitchen, and this fit the bill. It looks very nice and fits in a small space. The adjustable shelves make it very versatile. It went together easily with no missing parts, misdrilled holes, etc. The design makes it perfect to use in many rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Swing Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Love this pantry!!
customer_reviews.text: Needing extra food storage in my kitchen, this pantry worked perfectly! It closely matched my cabinets, so it looks like it really belongs. The veneer finish can easily scratch and it was a little bit of a struggle for a 66 year old woman to put together, but overall I'm super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Em-Dee

customer_reviews.title: Cams don't hold!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very attractive piece of furniture but it's not very sturdy. Many of the hidden cams fail to hold the sides together. I'm debating whether I could use a hammer and nails to more effectively attach the sides. I don't think I would purchase this item if I could do it over.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these cabinets to replace my old closetmaid shelves in the pantry. The hold a lot of stuff and are very nice looking and sturdy too. I'm totally happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MTNLASS

customer_reviews.title: They have 3 children that take piano lessons and 2 of them also take clarinet lessons and it is perfect to hold the all of the m
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is using it as a music holder in their music room. They have 3 children that take piano lessons and 2 of them also take clarinet lessons and it is perfect to hold the all of the music and the 2 clairnets. She is happy all of it is together instead of it being piled up in the corner. It is perfect and it has many uses. It is well constructed and easy to assemble, also very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: B. Woollen

customer_reviews.title: Love this cupboard
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best quality obviously, but it's great for what you pay for. It's easy enough to assemble and you don't need any special tools. It has a lot of room for a small cupboard. I like the look of the cupboard and fits perfectly with my kitchen decor.
customer_reviews.author: Alwaysbusy66

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: The quality is just amazing. I am 5'1 and 68 yr young woman and I was able to put this together in no time. I did assemble this on my bed with no problem. The directions are so easy to read. Taught me a lesson, I will only buy Sauder brands as others can not hold a candle.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Conner

customer_reviews.title: the instruction is written very poor. otherwise I would give it for a 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: very hard to put together, the instruction is written very poor. otherwise I would give it for a 5 star. Hope the manufacturer will make a clear instruction for this product. The top of the nails between the two top board should be flat, so there won't any gap between them. They probably wanted to design that way or a design defect. It is sturdy and good to use once put it together.
customer_reviews.author: one

customer_reviews.title: This is just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this cupboard to anyone needing a little extra storage (who doesn't need that?) I put it in my laundry room and am so glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, sturdy, and not too difficult to put together, but the door doesn't close quite right, even though I followed the instructions to the letter. IKEA has better quality items for the price...maybe not so much in sturdiness, but definitely in ease of construction and moving parts looking and working as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: I am so unbelievably disappointed because I've been waiting for this for about 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I received it, when I first opened it I thought it was made very well, then pulled the door out and saw a very noticeable scratch, I thought it wasn't that big of a deal and that i'll just fix it somehow, then when I took out the two long side pieces they were completely broken, almost in half. I am so unbelievably disappointed because I've been waiting for this for about 10 days and now I have to figure out how to return this and get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: dominic13

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive product description
customer_reviews.text: Good looking cabinet, quite sturdy and holds enough. However, when we were purchasing it, the description of the product said the finish was OAK. We were very surprised to find out that it is laminated wood. Sure enough, the description now says "Laminated engineered wood". And the price is $40 less! This was very rude and deceptive. Unfortunately, we bought this product 3 months before we could unwrap it and put it together (>>see the finish was fake and not real wood), so I guess nothing could be done now. It does its job very well and we had to swallow the lie.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten several compliments on this, people can't believe what i paid it. looks great in my kitchen. would definitely buy again. took me a few hours to put together though. magnet for closure is an issue, but i just leave it to close on its own. lots of room, seems to hold items without any buckling. great piece.
customer_reviews.author: Diane T.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price, take your time with assembly
customer_reviews.text: Good quality material. Caution- Take extra time lining up the back making sure it is lined up properly and the cabinet is square or the door will not line up and shut correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the last thing you put on is the ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure the last thing you put on is the back panel. WHY? Because it is important you adjust the door magnet to the metal latch.
customer_reviews.author: chieftopdog

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! Have bought Sauder furniture before and never had ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Have bought Sauder furniture before and never had a problem. Some of the holes for nails weren't predrilled, the backing is higher on one side and No matter what we did, we couldn't get the door to fit straight. Quite a gap on the top right.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Schroll

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews and trying to decide on a pantry cabinet, I decided on this one. I was a little worried after reading the reviews but it's a great cabinet! Took my husband about three hours to build and it's nice, functional and spacious. It's worth $100 bucks in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Surprising Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to serve as a broom closet. For the price, I found it more substantial than I thought it would be. I haven't installed the shelves and will put removable hooks inside to hold broom, mop, etc. in case I decide later to use it for other things. The inside height is only about 53"; so I wish it were a bit taller and a bit deeper to hold more items. Otherwise, nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: a good product
customer_reviews.text: a sturdy and reasonably good looking cabinet. assembly is OK. believe all the complaints about the magnetic door latch, tho! but it is not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the perfect item for storage. I needed something slim to fit kitchen items in. This was the perfect match. It did take about 2.5 hours to assemble but directions were clear and I was not missing any parts. Was not a frustrating experience to put together like I have had for other items similar to this one
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I read some reviews stating that the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I read some reviews stating that the door doesn't line up some. So after I put it together I was happy but said to my boyfriend yea the reviews were right it doesn't line up...He legit just loosed up the screws and lined it up and now its perfect. So when you are putting the door on just make sure you have it lined up and if not just readjust. its a easy fix. Its a great buy...I have a small kitchen and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and spacious pantry
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my kitchen since i have a very small space and most of the storage is wire shelves. Tried to assemble myself hut it was somewhat difficult. It took my husband about 4 hours but its worth it. It is a nice color and finish . It is very heavy so props to the delivery guy carrying all the way upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Sauder Summer Home Pantry
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impress with this pantry. It's well made, heavy and looks good. After reading the other reviews I made sure all pieces were there before starting and marked each piece that didn't have a tag and laid out the screws, etc. exactly the way it was laid out in the assembly instructions. I found it easy to assemble and would purchased another one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T

customer_reviews.title: we like it so much we're buying a second one for ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed more storage space in our kitchen as we don't have a proper pantry. This has been serving us well for several months now. In fact, we like it so much we're buying a second one for even more storage! Assembled easily, seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy! Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy! Easy to assemble. Perfect for extra space. We’re using it for canned foods, dry foods and spices. When we no longer need extra pantry kitchen space, this item will serve well for storage in any room! For books, DVDs, etc
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, so much storage, tough to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and holds way more than I expected. Great quality. Only con was that it was very time consuing to put together. it took me just over two hours (and I've had to furnish an entire apartment in the last week, so I've done a lot of furniture assembly recently). I used an electric screwdriver, I don't know if I would have been able to do it with just a traditional screwdriver. I think it's worth it, but definitely a personal choice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Silva

customer_reviews.title: OK, but not wonderful
customer_reviews.text: A little wobbly and directions not 100% clear. But you get what you pay for, and we didn't want to spend lots.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Versatile Storeage
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, easy to assemble, but takes some time to assemble. Very pleased at the Quality.
customer_reviews.author: JCJ

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy and not much storage
customer_reviews.text: Hate this, took a couple of hours to assemble and followed the directions to a tee. Not happy at all, top heavy, I’m moving to garage.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality but looks ok
customer_reviews.text: This was kind of a pain to put together (with two people) but we managed. While heavy, it is a pretty cheap product in quality. The door is especially cheap (literally feels like coated cardboard, not even particle board). That said, for how cheap of quality it is, it surprisingly looks decent in our kitchen and serves its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Looks
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing in the kitchen! Holds a lot more than I thought! Wonderful item! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable shelves are nice and it fits a good amount of appliances. Looks nice once it is assembled. Arrived in good condition, nothing broken like other reviews have stated. Very heavy box so be careful when moving.
customer_reviews.author: Harlan Heath

customer_reviews.title: Very cute pantry
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet was everything I expected. Happy to find no missing or broken pieces. The bottom of the cabinet has little plastic knobs on the legs. I'm not a fan, they cause it to lean but I can easily remove them or add some to the back legs, so it's not a big issue. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built well and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a nice cabinet, very sturdy. Plan on at least an hour to an hour and a half to assemble. Perfect for a kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: DazedandConfused

customer_reviews.title: Added much needed space to a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Worked well as extra cabinet storage in a small kitchen. On the smaller side though.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Just the size I needed
customer_reviews.text: My son put it together with no problems. It holds all the things I wanted to put in it. Makes the area look neater.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great storage addition
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this myself took some time but I finished. Extremely happy with this purchase, much needed for my apartment as I seem to be running out of space.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnygirl21

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cabinet. Great quality for the price. Much nicer than the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: MoonGoddess

customer_reviews.title: It fits nicely into a corner in the family room
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble this cabinet myself and the pieces fit together well. The door hangs straight and closes without gaps. I use it for the games I have for my grandchildren when they visit. It fits nicely into a corner in the family room. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Renier

customer_reviews.title: great for storage
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was a big project for me. It took me 4 hours to put it together. The instructions were not very clear but having had experience in putting together other cabinets and entertainment centers I was able to figure out how to line up the sides, etc. It holds a lot more than I thought it would I use it for extra pantry space. Definitely money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: MamaG

customer_reviews.title: Sauder has an easy to use customer service site to get replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: There is not much Amazon could do you increase my rating. This kit seems to be well built and heavy. At the core, this is a pressboard kit with an oak veneer applied over the pressboard. The arched piece on the front arrive "snapped" into two pieces. It would be much harder to snap a piece of solid oak, but also much more expensive. If it was a hidden piece, such as the back, I'd glue it and not worry about it. Sauder has an easy to use customer service site to get replacement parts. I'll be waiting 7-9 days to put this together.
customer_reviews.author: Rdizzler

customer_reviews.title: Extra storage for a good price, that looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, even though it's not real wood, it looks good where it is.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K.

customer_reviews.title: Quite a lot of storage space.
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for a broom and vacuum closet, but when it came it was so nice we decided to use it for storage of cooking utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie T.

customer_reviews.title: nice cabinet but assemble time is significant
customer_reviews.text: very nice cabinet overall. Very sturdy and I love that the shelves are adjustable. The only downfall is that it did take about 2-1/2 hours to put together and really should have another person around at times.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Broken parts
customer_reviews.text: Product was received with broken parts. Sides/trims. I believe the cabinet is okay if I can assemble the broken parts.
customer_reviews.author: volley

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the price paid...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and sturdy pantry cabinet. The wood is well made as well...
customer_reviews.author: mynight1

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Its not well made. Pieces had damage. Look for other options. Damages very easily obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Nicoletti

product_meta.title: Sauder Summer Home Pantry, Carolina Oak finish
product_meta.description: Bring style and storage to your home with this pantry from the Sauder Select collection. Behind the framed door with a beaded panel, it features three adjustable shelves so you can organize and store anything from boxes of pasta to bags of chips. Finished in Carolina Oak, this classy storage cabinet has everything you're looking for and more.
feature_bullets: Assembled dimensions: L: 21.496" x W: 14.488" x H: 61.102

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars681 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
